name: graph-MLM
tagline: Supplemental Material for Graphical Methods for Multivariate Linear Models in Psychological Research
body:
### Supplemental Material for Graphical Methods for Multivariate Linear Models in Psychological Research

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/gh-pages/DataEllipse.png)

This page is intended to serve as an accompaniment to a paper prepared by Dr. Michael Friendly (@friendly) and Matthew Sigal (@mattsigal). The article pertains to a tutorial for demonstrating methods of visualizing multivariate results with `R`.

Accordingly, `R` code is provided throughout the article with commentary, and is provided here in fully reproducible form. The code is divided into the following files:

| Dataset/Topic | R Script | Rendered HTML |
|:-------------:|:--------:|:-------------:|
|      NeuroCog (MANOVA)     |   [NeuroCog-ex.R](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/NeuroCog-ex.R)   |      [NeuroCog-ex.html](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/NeuroCog-ex.html)     |
|      Rohwer (MANCOVA)     |   [Rohwer-MANCOVA-ex.R](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/Rohwer-MANCOVA-ex.R)   |      [Rohwer-MANCOVA-ex.html](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/Rohwer-MANCOVA-ex.html)     |
|     Rohwer (MMRA)    |   [Rohwer-MMRA-ex.R](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/Rohwer-MMRA-ex.R)   |      [Rohwer-MMRA-ex.html](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/Rohwer-MMRA-ex.html)     |
|   SocialCog (MANOVA, Robust MLM)  |   [SC-ex.R](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/SC-ex.R)   |      [SC-ex.html](https://github.com/mattsigal/graph-MLM/raw/master/SC-ex.html)     |
  
Questions and commentary can be directed to either @friendly or @mattsigal.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
